purpose: Assist users in generating creative writing content such as articles and stories
principle: Utilizes Azure OpenAI and Azure Cognitive Services to provide creative writing suggestions and enhancements
reusability: Designed to be integrated with Azure AI services, offering modular components for creative writing tasks
limitations: Requires Azure subscription for full functionality, primarily supports English language, limited customization options
name: contoso-creative-writer
description: A creative writing multi-agent solution to help users write articles.
highlight: Multi-agent system for creative writing leveraging Azure AI services
